name: Ghost of Tomorrow
description:
Early Access

This game is Early Access, therefor, the main story is not finished and more content is planned.

Ghost of Tomorrow

It is the day of August 23, 2019 and you arrive at your apartment. Suddenly strange events that possess a paranormal nature begin to occur. These paranormal events seem to transcend the boundaries of both space and time as these events may give you a glimpse of what is yet to happen in the future. Experience these paranormal events and see what tomorrow holds.

Gameplay


Warning: Minor Spoilers Ahead

Ghost of Tomorrow is a psychological-horror first-person game. The game takes place in an apartment initially, where mysterious paranormal events with time-traveling nature begin to occur, giving the player glimpses of the horrible future that awaits them, while also being haunted by a strange ghost. As the player progresses, shortcuts through time and space are created, which allows the player to traverse to different locations and time. Progress through the story, read newspapers, notes, phone texts and investigate the future events that have yet to occur, find out if you can change the future events.
